member.name: IWICMetadataReader.GetCount
member.summary: Gets the number of metadata items within the reader.
member.param: Pointer that receives the number of metadata items within the reader.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IWICMetadataReader.GetEnumerator
member.summary: Gets an enumerator of all the metadata items.
member.param: Pointer that receives a pointer to the metadata enumerator.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IWICMetadataReader.GetMetadataFormat
member.summary: Gets the metadata format associated with the reader.
member.param: Pointer that receives the metadata format GUID.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IWICMetadataReader.GetMetadataHandlerInfo
member.summary: Gets the metadata handler info associated with the reader.
member.param: Pointer that receives a pointer to the .
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IWICMetadataReader.GetValue
member.param: Pointer to the metadata item's schema property.
Pointer to the metadata item's id.
Pointer that receives the metadata value.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IWICMetadataReader.GetValueByIndex
member.summary: Gets the metadata item at the given index.
member.param: The index of the metadata item to retrieve.
Pointer that receives the schema property.
Pointer that receives the id property.
Pointer that receives the metadata value.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IWICMetadataReader
member.summary: Exposes methods that provide access to underlining metadata content. This interface is implemented by independent software vendors (ISVs) to create new metadata readers.
